meanings.definition: A component or part of a larger unit
meanings.sent1: The engine is a crucial subunit of the car.
meanings.sent2: The subunit of the necklace broke off.
meanings.sent3: The subunit of the puzzle was missing, making it impossible to complete.
meanings.sent4: Each player is a subunit in the team, contributing to the overall success.
meanings.sent5: The subunit of the molecule determines its function and properties.

meanings.definition: A smaller unit that is part of a larger structure or organization
meanings.sent1: The department is a subunit of the company.
meanings.sent2: Each subunit of the machine has a specific function.
meanings.sent3: The subunit of the choir sang out of tune, causing laughter among the audience.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, each tree is a subunit of the ecosystem, playing a vital role.
meanings.sent5: The subunit of the book club met to discuss their latest read.
